name: Z.H.P. Unlosing Ranger VS Darkdeath Evilman
name_original: Z.H.P. Unlosing Ranger VS Darkdeath Evilman
description: The Unlosing Ranger is on his way to save Japan from Darkdeath Evilman when disaster strikes and he is struck by a car! With his dying breath he bequeaths his morphing belt to the true hero of the story: the most average boy in the universe. Will he rise to the challenge?
